item.description:
Let's Join the New Haven Dining group for some fun and music....

The Turtles are a U.S. rock group led by vocalists Howard Kaylan and Mark Volman. The band became notable for several Top 40 hits beginning with its cover version of Bob Dylan's "It Ain't Me Babe" in 1965. The group scored its biggest and best-known hit in 1967 with the song "Happy Together."

Bring your chair, a blanket, an appetizer or dessert to share and your favorite wine, beer or cocktail.
We will wine and dine under the stars, and sing along to some of the great tunes from the 60's, and be so "Happy Together"
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Purple and Yellow balloons.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Let's get together and have fun with The Turtles!!
